GWEN_EXPORT int Gwen::Utility::vsnprintf ( char *  _str,
size_t  _count,
const char *  _format,
va_list  _argList 
)

Cross platform implementation of vsnprintf that returns number of characters which would have been written to the final string if enough space had been available.
